trans-unit.source: Defines a method that the <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider" /> class calls to retrieve user credentials.
trans-unit.target: 定義供 <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider" /> 類別呼叫的方法，以擷取使用者認證。

trans-unit.source: When using forms authentication with client application services, you can pass a user name and password to the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.ValidateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當使用表單驗證使用用戶端應用程式服務，您可以傳遞的使用者名稱和密碼，<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.ValidateUser%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also pass empty strings or `null` as the parameters to use a credentials provider.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以傳遞空字串或 `null` 做為使用認證提供者的參數。

trans-unit.source: A credentials provider is a class that you provide and specify in your application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 認證提供者是您在應用程式組態中所提供和指定的類別。

trans-unit.source: A credentials provider class must implement the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider> interface, which has a single method named <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 認證提供者類別必須實作具有名為 <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> 單一方法的 <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider> 介面。

trans-unit.source: A typical <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> method implementation will display a dialog box to retrieve user input.
trans-unit.target: 一般<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A>方法實作會顯示對話方塊，以擷取使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: Using a credentials provider enables you to share a single login dialog box among multiple applications.
trans-unit.target: 您可透過使用認證提供者在多個應用程式之間分享單一登入對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Implement User Login with Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-implement-user-login-with-client-application-services.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：使用用戶端應用程式服務實作使用者登入](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-implement-user-login-with-client-application-services.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> method, which is the only member in this interface.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A>方法，是在此介面中的唯一成員。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> method is part of a login dialog box class.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A>方法是登入對話方塊類別的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This method displays the dialog box, and then returns a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials> instance initialized with the user-specified values.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會顯示對話方塊，然後傳回<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials>的使用者指定值初始化的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves user credentials.
trans-unit.target: 擷取使用者認證。

trans-unit.source: The user login information.
trans-unit.target: 使用者登入資訊。

trans-unit.source: When using forms authentication with client application services, you can pass a user name and password to the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.ValidateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當使用表單驗證使用用戶端應用程式服務，您可以傳遞的使用者名稱和密碼，<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.ValidateUser%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also pass empty strings or `null` as the parameters to use a credentials provider.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以傳遞空字串或 `null` 做為使用認證提供者的參數。

trans-unit.source: A credentials provider is a class that you provide and specify in your application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 認證提供者是您在應用程式組態中所提供和指定的類別。

trans-unit.source: A credentials provider class must implement the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider> interface, which has a single method called <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 認證提供者類別必須實作<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider>介面具有單一方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A typical <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> method implementation will display a dialog box to retrieve user input.
trans-unit.target: 一般<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A>方法實作會顯示對話方塊，以擷取使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: Using a credentials provider enables you to share a single login dialog box among multiple applications.
trans-unit.target: 您可透過使用認證提供者在多個應用程式之間分享單一登入對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Implement User Login with Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-implement-user-login-with-client-application-services.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：使用用戶端應用程式服務實作使用者登入](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-implement-user-login-with-client-application-services.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> method is part of a login dialog box class.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A>方法是登入對話方塊類別的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This method displays the dialog box, and then returns a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials> instance initialized with the user-specified values.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會顯示對話方塊，然後傳回<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials>的使用者指定值初始化的執行個體。
